directions: Place strawberries and yogurt in blender or food processor. Blend until strawberries are in small chunks.
In a large bowl, mix together whipped topping and gelatin. Stir in strawberry mixture. Pour mixture into baked pastry shell and chill overnight.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Strawberry Yogurt Pie II
